flawed_nl_solution:
Mary started with 5 books and returned 3 so she had 5-3 = <<5-3=4>>4 books
She had 4 books and checked out 5 more books so she had 4+5 = <<4+5=9>>9 books
She now has 9 books but returned 2 so she has 9-2 = <<9-2=7>>7 books
She had 7 books and checked out 7 more books so she has 7+7 = <<7+7=14>>14 books checked out
#### 14

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2, not 4. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
